mil7.7.7:5.1: “Bhante nāgasena, ‘maṇiratanassa tīṇi aṅgāni gahetabbānī’ti yaṃ vadesi, katamāni tāni tīṇi aṅgāni gahetabbānī”ti?
mil7.7.7:5.3: evameva kho, mahārāja, yoginā yogāvacarena ekantaparisuddhājīvena bhavitabbaṃ.
mil7.7.7:5.4: Idaṃ, mahārāja, maṇiratanassa paṭhamaṃ aṅgaṃ gahetabbaṃ.
mil7.7.7:6.1: Puna caparaṃ, mahārāja, maṇiratanaṃ na kenaci saddhiṃ missīyati;
mil7.7.7:6.2: evameva kho, mahārāja, yoginā yogāvacarena pāpehi pāpasahāyehi saddhiṃ na missitabbaṃ.
mil7.7.7:6.3: Idaṃ, mahārāja, maṇiratanassa dutiyaṃ aṅgaṃ gahetabbaṃ.
mil7.7.7:7.1: Puna caparaṃ, mahārāja, maṇiratanaṃ jātiratanehi yojīyati;
mil7.7.7:7.2: evameva kho, mahārāja, yoginā yogāvacarena uttamavarajātimantehi saddhiṃ saṃvasitabbaṃ, paṭipannakaphalaṭṭhasekkhaphalasamaṅgīhi sotāpannasakadāgāmianāgāmiarahantatevijjachaḷabhiññasamaṇamaṇiratanehi saddhiṃ saṃvasitabbaṃ.
mil7.7.7:7.3: Idaṃ, mahārāja, maṇiratanassa tatiyaṃ aṅgaṃ gahetabbaṃ.
